comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: This is Inuki-mon, formerly known as Naka-mon (central gate) at Shotokuin in Zozoji Temple in the Shiba area of Minato, Tokyo. Nagasaki University has another photo by Kusakabe, taken a bit lower and colorized differently.

comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: The gate is now in the northeast corner of Zojoji, and is left closed.
